description:
![Screenshot of Genius Web Annotator](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/qG8wl8x5Ldd1LxGPBPTYBHuknspRmSn6Cdey_KmcH77JzQZjODHwZJj4fSCKoDcfOz24YRWeagM=w640-h400-e365)
	
##Genius is making the annotated web a reality.

Bringing the dreams of the original internet into the future…

The earliest web browsers were meant to include annotation, but couldn't for technical reasons. 20 years later, Genius is making the annotated web a reality.

Add your thoughts and commentary to any page on the Internet.	

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/genius-chrome/readme.md)**
summary: Genius lets you add line-by-line annotations to any page on the Internet
author: genius.com
